original_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Turtles Awesome Easter
overview: The Turtles' Awesome Easter is a 1987-1996 animated series home video. It was released by Family Home Entertainment on 11 April 199. It contains episodes: "The Turtles and the Hare" and "Once Upon a Time Machine"
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Turtles Awesome Easter
